name: PEDro or Cochrane to Assess the Quality of Clinical Trials? A meta-epidemiological study
description: We compared trials of physical therapy (PT) judged to be of adequate quality based on summary scores from the Physiotherapy Evidence Database (PEDro) scale with trials judged to be of adequate quality by Cochrane Risk of Bias criteria.

distribution.name: Cochrane_PeDRo_PLOSONE_June5_15.xls
distribution.description: data for study PEDro or Cochrane to Assess the Quality of Clinical Trials? A meta-epidemiological study
